Action Counter.name: Action Counter
Action Counter.description:
For use with PF2e Animations and Automated Animations.

This effect lets you keep track of actions. That's it.

Attack Animation Template (Critical Fail.name: Attack Animation Template (Critical Failure)
Attack Animation Template (Critical Fail.description:
For use with PF2e Animations and Automated Animations.

This is a successor to PF2e Workbench's World Special Effect settings.

This fake action lets you pick whichever animation you want for critical or regular success/failure Strikes. You can customize said animation by clicking the A-A button at the top.

This action appears in the Downtime tab of your sheet.

Summoning Animation Template.name: Summoning Animation Template
Summoning Animation Template.description:
For use with PF2e Animations and Automated Animations.

This fake action lets you pick whichever animation you want when summoning a creature through PF2e Animations. You can customize said animation by clicking the A-A button at the top.

You can add parenthesis to the end of this action to animate a specific spell, action, or even creature animation. If you have multiple actions applying to the same activity, Creatures take priority, then Spells/Actions, then lastly the general Summoning Animation Template without any parenthesis. If your sheet does not have one, it will default to the one in the PF2e Animations compendium.

Example: Summoning Animation Template (Badger) will supserscede Summoning Animation Template (Summon Animal).

This action appears in the Downtime tab of your sheet.

Examples:

  • Summoning Animation Template (Badger)
  • Summoning Animation Template (Summon Animal)
  • Summoning Animation Template (Manifest Eidolon)
  • Summoning Animation Template (My Special Angel Eidolon's Name)
  • Summoning Animation Template (Zombie)
  • Summoning Animation Template (Summon Anarch)
